creator: Jack Gaver; Dave Stanley
description:
LibriVox recording of There's Laughter in the Air! Radio's Top Comedians and Their Best Shows by Jack Gaver; Dave Stanley. Read in English by Maria Kasper; Bellona Times; Phil Chenevert; Larry Wilson; Kristin Gjerløw; Little Tee; ElleyKat; Jennifer Dorr; SteveToner; Arianne Stein. There's Laughter in the Air takes readers on a sidesplitting romp through the world of old-time radio comedy. It gives a brief history of the medium and brief but intimate accounts of some of the biggest acts from the 30s and 40s. Gaver and Stanley give insight on several luminaries from the days of vintage radio: Jack Benny, Fred Allen, Fibber McGee and Molly, Burns and Allen, Amos 'n Andy, and more! (Summary by ChuckW For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.

Download M4B (144MB)
